comment: культиста убили свои же хаос спейсмарины

languages.text: По характеру повреждений ясно, что голову этому человеку буквально оторвали, открутили от тела.
By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.
languages.original_text: По характеру повреждений ясно, что голову этому человеку буквально оторвали, открутили от тела.

traits.locale_text: By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.

languages.text: A juzgar por sus heridas, está claro que a este hombre le arrancaron literalmente la cabeza, girándola hasta separarla del cuerpo.
languages.original_text: By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por sus heridas, está claro que a este hombre le arrancaron literalmente la cabeza, girándola hasta separarla del cuerpo.

languages.text: 从伤口判断，这个人的头很明显是被拧下来的，从身体上活活扭下来的。
languages.original_text: By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.

traits.locale_text: 从伤口判断，这个人的头很明显是被拧下来的，从身体上活活扭下来的。

languages.text: その傷からして、この男の頭は体からねじられ、文字通りねじ切られたのは明らかである。
languages.original_text: By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.

traits.locale_text: その傷からして、この男の頭は体からねじられ、文字通りねじ切られたのは明らかである。

languages.text: La nature des blessures montre que la tête de cet homme a été littéralement arrachée, dévissée de son corps.
languages.original_text: By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.

traits.locale_text: La nature des blessures montre que la tête de cet homme a été littéralement arrachée, dévissée de son corps.

languages.text: Den Verwundungen nach wurde der Kopf dieses Mannes buchstäblich durch Drehen vom Körper abgeschraubt.
languages.original_text: By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.

traits.locale_text: Den Verwundungen nach wurde der Kopf dieses Mannes buchstäblich durch Drehen vom Körper abgeschraubt.

languages.text: Yaraların yapısına bakılırsa bu adamın başının kelimenin tam anlamıyla koparılarak bedeninden ayrıldığı belli oluyor.
languages.original_text: By the nature of the injuries, it is clear that the head of this man was literally wrenched off, unscrewed from the body.
